org.bytedeco.nvcodec.nvencodeapi

Class NV_ENC_MAP_INPUT_RESOURCE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.nvcodec.nvencodeapi.NV_ENC_MAP_INPUT_RESOURCE

    AutoCloseable

    @Properties(inherit=nvencodeapi.class)
public class NV_ENC_MAP_INPUT_RESOURCE
extends Pointer
    \struct _NV_ENC_MAP_INPUT_RESOURCE Map an input resource to a Nvidia Encoder Input Buffer
